snippet: The lawyer for Saints linebacker Jonathan Vilma, who has been suspended for the 2012 season, asked the N.F.L. for a broad range of evidence, including the names of likely whistle-blowers.
abstract: NFL Roundup; lawyer for New Orleans Saints linebacker Jonathan Vilma, who has been suspended for the 2012 season for his role in bounty scheme, asks the league to release evidence it gathered during its investigation, including the names of likely whistle-blowers; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for Saints linebacker Jonathan Vilma, who has been suspended for the 2012 season, asked the N.F.L. for a broad range of evidence, including the names of likely whistle-blowers.

headline.seo: Lawyer Demands N.F.L. Release Evidence in Bounty Investigation
headline.main: Vilma Asks to See Evidence That Led to His Ban
headline.print_headline: Vilma Asks For Release Of Evidence Behind Ban
